ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Faction question
ygData.msgSnippet: Might try killing the raiders in SK (Turn left off the bridge after zoning from NK go aways, there is a camp) or in NK (also along the shore, between 2 bridges
ygData.messageBody:
Might try killing the raiders in SK (Turn left off the
bridge after zoning from NK go aways, there is a camp)
or in NK (also along the shore, between 2 bridges in
NK) there is a really fast spawn rate. Drop bronze
weapons, and a GOOD *shudder* character can get the
red sashes for quest in Qeynos worth about 2 plat each
but NO DROP. Anyways, I kill them with lower level
druids becuase of Harmony and thier extreme agro.
Green to me at 16ish but still ALL run when I zap one
of them at 19, my 21 lvl character does not have this
problem although one of the magic users did agro on me
even at that lvl once.

did I ramble? Quizikalli the umm ooo I forget.

--- Stan Gilliland <stang@...> wrote:
> I have raised a dark elf necro up to level 18 and am
> visiting High Pass. The "volunteer" just inside the
> gate past the orc camp still scowls at me ready to
> attack. How many orcs must I annihilate before they
> view me a little more friendly in there? Is there
> some kind of shortcut to better faction here?
>
> I have spent the bulk of my time in North Ro, Oasis,
> Befallen, Lavastorm and of course the dark wood
> outside Neriak.
>
> Any help on improving my faction would be
> appreciated!
>
> Wyrmy, 18 lvl DE Necro, Bristlebane
>
>
